content:
The Winter 23 release of Knowledge includes a release update for the Lightning Article Editor and Article Personalization for Knowledge.

Learn about the release update and how to enable and configure it for use.

Considerations and Limitations for the Lightning Editor:
Review related considerations and limitations before enabling.

Considerations and Limitations for Article Personalization for Knowledge and Dynamic Forms:
Enable this feature and benefits of Dynamic Forms will be available.

Lightning Article Editor:
Author knowledge articles easily with a user-friendly and powerful editor.
Give authors and managers a better experience to create high-quality articles.

Article Personalization for Knowledge:
Tailor knowledge content to business needs and unlock agent productivity.

Configure Knowledge Record Pages with Dynamic Forms:
Migrate fields and sections from the Knowledge record page layout as individual components into the Lightning App Builder. Apply visibility rules to show only relevant fields and sections.

SEE ALSO: Manage Release Updates
title: Service Cloud Knowledge Release Update
